original_text: There had not been a Passover festival like that in Israel since the time of the prophet Samuel. No king of Israel had enjoyed a Passover festival as good as the one that King Josiah had. The priests, the Levites and all the people enjoyed the festival. They were the people of Judah, the people of Israel who had come to Jerusalem, as well as the people who lived in Jerusalem.
korean_text: 선지자 사무엘 이후로 이스라엘 가운데서 유월절을 이같이 지키지 못하였고 이스라엘 모든 왕들도 요시야가 제사장들과 레위 사람들과 모인 온 유다와 이스라엘 무리와 예루살렘 주민과 함께 지킨 것처럼은 유월절을 지키지 못하였더라

sentences.original_text: There had not been a Passover festival like that in Israel
since the time of the prophet Samuel
No king of Israel had enjoyed a Passover festival as good as
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 왕 중에는 이처럼 좋은 유월절을 즐기지 못했더라

sentences.original_text: the one that King Josiah had
The priests, the Levites and all the people enjoyed the festival
sentences.korean_translation: 제사장들과 레위 사람들과 모든 백성이 그 절기를 즐겼더라

sentences.original_text: They were the people of Judah
the people of Israel who had come to Jerusalem
as well as the people who lived in Jerusalem
